pages.text:
Invar Chickens are a species of ''alloy'' chickens. It is notable for its uniquely low coefficient of thermal expansion - in other words, it's very heatproof. Mainly, Invar belongs in places with a requirement for high dimensional stability and precision.
Lay Item: Invar Ingots.$(br2)Keep in mind that the Chicken itself is $(l)not/$ heatproof.
